name: Puppy Dice
description:
Do you want to play with a cute dog? In Puppy Dice, you have the chance to achieve it. It combines dice and puzzle together with beautiful scene.

How can you do?
Tap to roll, go forward and collect gifts or rewards.
Unlock new themes to get different experience.

If you want to relax, Come and download Puppy Dice. It won’t let you down.
